âœ¨ dasshh | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Interacting with a computer using natural language commands via a terminal-based AI assistant.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Interactive chat UI â€¢ Personal assistant on the terminal â€¢ Performs actions on the computer with plain English â€¢ Extensible with custom tools
ðŸ“– Summary: Dasshh is a terminal-based AI assistant that allows users to interact with their computer using natural language. It provides an interactive chat UI to execute system tasks, manage processes, and extend functionality with custom tools, all through simple English commands.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ circuitpython-peckus | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Securely storing and accessing cryptographic keys or other sensitive data on a USB device, ensuring access only when the user is present and automatically locking when the user is absent.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Presence-enforced USB storage â€¢ Bluetooth LE unlocking â€¢ Automatic relocking based on timeout or user absence â€¢ Read-only payload exposure
ðŸ“– Summary: PECKUS is a CircuitPython-based project that creates a presence-enforcing USB storage device. It stores a file (typically a cryptographic key) and only exposes it as a USB drive after successful presence verification, usually via Bluetooth LE. The device automatically relocks after a timeout or when the user's presence is no longer detected, providing an air-gap security benefit.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ Find-Family | Kotlin
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: End-to-end encrypted location sharing with family and friends.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ End-to-end encryption â€¢ Temporary location sharing control â€¢ Saved places with notifications â€¢ Battery status monitoring â€¢ Open source client
ðŸ“– Summary: Find Family is a cross-platform application designed for secure location sharing among family and friends. It offers end-to-end encryption, temporary sharing controls, saved place notifications, and battery status monitoring. The app prioritizes privacy by not requiring personal information and is fully open source.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ rasa | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating text- and voice-based conversations using machine learning to build contextual assistants and chatbots.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ NLU (Natural Language Understanding) â€¢ Dialogue Management â€¢ Integration with multiple platforms (Slack, Facebook, etc.) â€¢ Voice assistant capabilities (Alexa, Google Home)
ðŸ“– Summary: Rasa is an open-source machine learning framework designed to automate conversations. It provides tools for NLU, dialogue management, and integrations with various messaging platforms and voice assistants. Rasa enables developers to build contextual assistants capable of engaging in layered, back-and-forth conversations.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ Signal-Android | Kotlin
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Private and secure messaging for Android devices.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Secure messaging using data connection (WiFi/3G/4G/5G) â€¢ High-fidelity message sending and receiving â€¢ HD voice/video calls â€¢ Advanced privacy-preserving technology
ðŸ“– Summary: Signal Android is a secure messaging application that prioritizes user privacy. It enables users to send high-fidelity messages, make HD voice/video calls, and communicate securely using their phone's data connection. The application employs advanced privacy-preserving technology to ensure secure communication.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ shell_commands_for_Linux | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Provides a collection of shell scripts and Python scripts to automate common Linux tasks and manage JetBrains IDE licenses.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Scripts for Linux system administration â€¢ Scripts for managing PHP versions â€¢ Scripts for creating local Apache hosts â€¢ Scripts for resetting JetBrains IDE evaluation periods (PyCharm, PhpStorm)
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository offers a collection of useful scripts for Linux environments, written in Python and Bash. It includes scripts for managing PHP versions, creating local Apache hosts, and resetting evaluation licenses for JetBrains IDEs like PyCharm and PhpStorm, enabling continued use beyond the initial trial period.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ bokeh | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Creating interactive plots, dashboards, and data applications for modern web browsers.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Interactive data visualization â€¢ Versatile graphics construction â€¢ High-performance interactivity â€¢ Support for large and streaming datasets â€¢ Creation of interactive plots, dashboards, and data applications
ðŸ“– Summary: Bokeh is a Python library for creating interactive data visualizations in web browsers. It allows developers to build elegant and versatile graphics with high-performance interactivity, even with large or streaming datasets. Bokeh is designed to help users quickly and easily create interactive plots, dashboards, and data applications.
